model run = `r Sys.time()`

## Packages 
```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)

library(caret)
library(parallel)
library(doParallel)
```

## Load data
```{r}
load(file = "../data/input.data.rds")
summary(input.data)
```

## Start Parallel Processing

```{r}
detectCores()
getDoParWorkers()
cl <- makeCluster(detectCores()-1)
registerDoParallel(cl)
getDoParName()
getDoParWorkers()
#registerDoSEQ() # to stop parallel processing
```

#### Make training and test set

```{r}
library(caret)
set.seed(123)
inTrain <- createDataPartition(y = input.data$bbog, 
                               p = .75, # The percentage of data in the training set
                               list = FALSE) # The format of the results

training <- input.data[inTrain,]
testing <- input.data[-inTrain,]
nrow(training); nrow(testing)
table(training$bbog)
table(testing$bbog)
```

#### run model
Need the latest version of caret from github to avoid known bug.
```{r}

#run without moorland line
training10a <- training[!(names(training) %in% c("moorline"))] 

M.rf.10a <- train(bbog ~ .,
                data= training10a, 
                method = "rf")
save(M.rf.10a, file = "../data/models/Mrf10a.rds")

M.rf.10a
```



```{r}
plot(varImp(object= M.rf.10a), main= "RF - Variable Importance")
```

### Predict from model

```{r}
#Predictions
predictions10a <- caret::predict.train(object = M.rf.10a, newdata = testing, type="prob", index = "present")
```

```{r}
plot(predictions10a$present ~ testing$bbog)
plot(predictions10a$absent ~ testing$bbog)
```

```{r}
confusionMatrix(predictions10a, testing$bbog)
```


### run final models

```{r}
input.data.10a <- input.data[names(input.data) %in% names(training10a)] 
M.rf.10a.final <- train(bbog ~ .,
                data = input.data.10a,
                method = "rf")
save(M.rf.10a.final, file = "../data/models/Mrf10afinal.rds")


M.rf.10a.final
```
